113 
 
 
COURSE/DEGREE 
AWARDING INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (ix) OOU – Biology or Agricultural Science and any other 
two (2) relevant subjects.  
(x) LASU requires Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics.  
(xi) ABU requires Mathematics as the third (3rd) subject.  
(xii) BOWEN requires Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
